alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:29AM CDT until August 03 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR BUCHANAN...NORTHEASTERN BENTON...NORTHWESTERN JONES... SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE AND LINN COUNTIES... At 1029 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lime Creek County Park to Cedar Rapids, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Independence, Anamosa, Vinton, Marion, Hiawatha, Robins, Jesup, Center Point, Fairfax, Atkins, Urbana, Central City, Springville, Palo, Shellsburg, Winthrop, Hazleton, Walker and Alburnett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
